meanings: (부사) for a moment[minute, while, short time, second], briefly
Adverb for a while, for a moment, for some time

examples.korean: for a while 발음듣기 잠시. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
for a time 발음듣기 잠시. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
She stared stonily at him for a minute. 발음듣기 그녀는 그를 잠시 돌처럼 차갑게 응시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stared stonily at him for a minute. 발음

examples.korean: The senator pondered the question for a moment. 발음듣기 상원의원이 그 질문을 잠시 곰곰이 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The senator pondered the question for a moment. 발음

examples.korean: He paused to allow his words to sink in. 발음듣기 그는 자기 말이 충분히 이해되도록 잠시 말을 쉬었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He paused to allow his words to sink in. 발음
